summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2647, for the improvement of Avalon Way, from West Spokane Street to 35th Avenue Southwest, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 31110 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
